messages.subject: Re: Mwrow....   sorry...   Re: [samuraihistory] Ronin and wrong james
messages.msgSnippet: lizzzie you apologised to the wrong james. Its me whom posted the ronin novel question,we all have bad days so ill let it slide and i assure you im fully
messages.messageBody:
lizzzie you apologised to the wrong james. Its me whom posted the ronin novel question,we all have bad days so ill let it slide and i assure you im fully capable of independent thought ( Im in fact a rather sad paleontologist into theropodomorph evolution theories) ,and thanks nathan for the help very much appreciated.

Elizabeth Chase <lizzirrd@...> wrote:
Nathan pointed out that I was not so kind as I might have been. I was rude to your post, because I was tired and cranky and less
the supervisor of my catty fingers than was necessary at the time. Some days I should just lay down by my dish and ignore the
world.

Hope you find some good source material.

Lizzie

----- Original Message -----
From: "james wilson"
To:
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 2004 10:31 PM
Subject: Re: Mwrow.... sorry... Re: [samuraihistory] Ronin



Hello how are you. From whence did this come. Why did you just tell me that. I apologize but I missed the point. So for the mis
spellers and people that are not quiet so intellectual can you please tell us ur hidden message. And if I am the only one and I
might could you please break it down for me. Thanks a plenty GOD BLESS YOU.

Elizabeth Chase
wrote:
Yeah, I apologize, Mr. Wilson. You did make an effort.

Sigh.

I came home from work extra tired and cranky. I spent the day taking care of a couple of newborn infants whose stupid drug-infested
mothers do stupid things to them. Like one of them putting methadone in her infant's formula to shut him up..... and it almost
worked permanently. Mom tried to pin it on her 7 year old.

It doesn't justify my being rude, though. I should have taken my nap before I checked my email.

I'm sorry for taking a potshot at you in my frustration, Mr. Wilson. I will try to play nice again.

Bad puddy-tat,

Lizzie


----- Original Message -----
From: Nate Ledbetter
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 2004 6:31 PM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Ronin



--- Elizabeth Chase
wrote:

Develop some
> independent thinking skills, as well as your grammar
> and spelling.

Now, now, let's all be nice. I think the spelling
thing has been beaten to the ground (mostly by me).
He's making an effort, and that's what I ask for.

messages.messageBody:
Nathan pointed out that I was not so kind as I might have been. I was rude to your post, because I was tired and cranky and less
the supervisor of my catty fingers than was necessary at the time. Some days I should just lay down by my dish and ignore the
world.

Hope you find some good source material.

Lizzie

messages.messageBody:
Yeah, I apologize, Mr. Wilson. You did make an effort.

Sigh.

I came home from work extra tired and cranky. I spent the day taking care of a couple of newborn infants whose stupid drug-infested
mothers do stupid things to them. Like one of them putting methadone in her infant's formula to shut him up..... and it almost
worked permanently. Mom tried to pin it on her 7 year old.

It doesn't justify my being rude, though. I should have taken my nap before I checked my email.

I'm sorry for taking a potshot at you in my frustration, Mr. Wilson. I will try to play nice again.

Bad puddy-tat,

Lizzie
